unnormalised: Arrey yaar, he CBSE class 10th-acheo exams Bollywood suspense movie-anchea bhaxen. Dor ek pai 90%+-anchi aasha karta, ani dor ek vidhyarthi pass zanvk prarthana karta! Mhaka yaad asa mhuzo roll no. slip exam-achea 2 disam adhi diun mhaka dista asa mhaka sanglem sonvsaracho shevatt mhunn? Atam hanv fakat mhuzhea shikxan loan-anche EMI bharta. Shubhechha bhurgeank, zaast tras gheunakat; 12vea board exam-achea uprant jinn ekdam vegllench vegram zata. BTW, mhuzhea cousin-ak 60% mellle ani to atam Goa-nt chilling korta. Sangonk matshach!
normalised: Arrey yaar, hea C-B-S-E class tenth cheo exams mhuntlear Bollywood suspense moviem zoxeo. Ek ek pai ninety percent plus mellche mhunn aasha kortat, ani ek ek student pass zanvche mhunn prarthana kortat! Mhaka dishta, mhuzo roll number slip diunchea don disam adhi eksamache mhunn mhaka dislem tem sonvsarachem xevott aslem? Atam hanv fakt mhajea education loanache E-M-I bhorthan. Bhurgeak shubkamnao, chinta korum naka; baraiche eksameam uprant jivit ekdom veglem crazy asta. B-T-W, mhojea cousinak sixty percent melle ani to atam Goeam-nt chilling korta. Fakt sangtam!
